name: Nikli

name: Sajek
description: Surrounded by the hills of Mizoram on the east and Tripura on the north, Sajek Valley that once witnessed insurgencies now showcases Bangladesh's cultural diversity engaging people of different ethnicities in developing tourism in the area for their economic benefit and social uplifting.

name: Sundarban
description: From above, the Sundarbans mangrove forest is an impressive labyrinth of colors and textures. The clear blues of the Bay of Bengal run into the murky waters of criss-crossing river systems lined by emerald foliage.

name: Kuakata
description: Bangladesh is a dreamland of bewitching natural beauty and Kuakata, locally known as 'Sagar Kannya' Daughter of the sea, has contributed a lot to her beauty. This rare scenic tourist spot is situated in Latachapli Union under the Kalapara Police Station of Patuakhali district. The length of Kuakata is 30 km and its breadth is 6 km. It is 70 km from Patuakhali district headquarters and 320 km from Dhaka.

name: Jaflong
description: Clouds like fog on the mountain, for the first time, you may not realize. It is so tough to turn your eyes watching the combination of the mountain with the cloud under the blue sky. White Cloud, Blue Sky, High Mountains, Blue Water, what a beautiful sight! Jaflong is such a place like this. We all know, Sylhet is a beautiful place in Bangladesh and Jaflong is one of them.
